args: Please note that this story contains spoilers\nfor the ＂Flames of Reflection＂ event.

Woof! It is HOT in here! Feels like walking
through a desert that's also on fire.
Still, if the legendary magmite ore really
IS here, we need to find it.
That stuff is loaded to bursting with flame\nmana, which means we can use it to make\nsome kick-butt weapons!
Yep! Findin' that ore is how we're gonna\nwin the Golden Anvil a second time.
I want us to make a weapon even more\namazing than the one we made last time.\nSo c'mon, Rena! Find that ore already!
I have already begun to search.
The ore is said to be found in places\nfull of flame mana, which means...
Yes! Let's check right over there!
Uh, Sis? You're pointing at a fire.\nLike, literally INSIDE a fire.
Hey, no one senses mana like our sis.\nSo if she says there's ore in them thar\nflames, then I'm buyin' it come payday!
Still, it's probably not smart for us to be\npokin' around an actual fire. Think you can\ncool it down for us, Renee?
Hee hee! Oh, you know I can.\nHere goes nothing!
Well, poo. The flames are so darn hot,\nI can barely cool them down at all!
Well, if you can't cool 'em down,\nthen I'll have to adjust the temperature.\nBegone, O flames!
Okay, that STILL didn't do anything?!
While I find the prospect of leaping into\nthose flames daunting, we may\nhave no choice...
But we will never achieve victory\nwithout that ore.
Besides, Coach taught us all about\nhow to handle a bit of heat!
He taught us how to handle heat, not how\nto walk around in an actual freakin' FIRE!
Renee's right. We'll just have to find\nsome other way to win the Golden Anvil.
Ach, lassies! Ye be the sisters from\nRegis's workshop, aye? Fancy runnin'\ninto you lot here.
Lazry? What are YOU doing here?!
Oh, I'm always comin' here.\nOne'a me favorite haunts, it be.
You LIKE being this hot and miserable?
Aye, the heat suits us rokkans to a T.\n'Sides, ain't no better place to be\ngatherin' the ore me needs.
But just a moment, now. Did ye three\ntrig lassies ALSO come here for ore?
Heck yeah! We're gonna use the magmite\nore to make an awesome weapon and\ntotally win the next Golden Anv—
Quiet, ya dope! Stop spillin' secrets\nto our most bitter rival!
Got your hands on some magmite, did ye?\nImpressive! That heat's too much for\neven a rokkan like me to be takin'.
Actually, um...we haven't mined any yet.
Ah, I see. Want a hand, then?
What's wrong, lass? Ye look like a girl\nwhat dropped her hammer on the floor.

Why would you possibly help us?
If we use that ore to make somethin'
amazing, it's gonna hurt your chances
of winning the Golden Anvil!
Aye. But if ye be makin' somethin' so fine,\nI'll just have to do ye one better.
That be the true spirit of competition, aye?
Sure, I guess. It's just impressive to see\nsomeone who's so...CONFIDENT.
Right? I mean, you seem so laid-back,\nbut we all know you can really bring it\nwhen it counts.
It is one of your finest qualities.
Not sure how much of a compliment\nthat be, but I'll thank ye regardless.
Still, if you are willing to help us after all\nthat, we would very much appreciate it.
Then less chatter, more...uh...mining!\nFirst, we need to cool that fire.
Begone, O flames! Begone, I say!\nThis cool enough for you, Lazry?!
Just be careful, yeah? If you ever feel like\nyou're in danger, get outta there!
Right then. I'll be back in two shakes\nof a badger's tuckus.
Goodness, but the rokkan are strong.
Mmm, this isn't good. She's been gone\nfor FAR too long.
I can't even hear her hammer anymore.\nDo you think she...you know? *gulp*
Hang on, Lazry! We're comin' to save you!
About damn time! We were just gonna\nhop in there and start lookin' for you!
Aye, I tried to mine as much as I could,\nso it took a bit longer than I wanted.
Heavens, Lazry! This is so much ore!
Aye, I forgot to ask how much ye'd be\nneedin', so I just grabbed a whole pile.
I can't believe you did all this for us.
Still, you gotta let us make it up to you.\nWhaddya need? Just name it!
No way, pal! I don't like bein' in debt,\nso I'm gonna pay you back!
Oh, I know! We could all go out on a\nbig shopping trip together!
What a wonderful idea! We'll buy a\nshiny new wardrobe for Lazry.
Right then! It's settled. Get your shoppin'\nshoes on and meet us at the market.
...A date, eh? My, but that feels nice.
Still, good to know I can handle flames\ntoo hot for those three lassies.
'Course, I shouldn't be surprised,\nseein' as I'm rokkan and all...
But maybe that be me key to victory!
